column2: Review of principles undertaken by and frequency

column1:
Performance against above policies 
and                           follow up action
column2:
As  a  practice,  BR  policies  of  the  Corporation  are  reviewed  periodically 
or on a need basis by department heads, business heads and executive 
directors. During this assessment, the efficacy of the policies are reviewed 
and necessary changes to policies and procedures are implemented.
